results.name: Signature permutation of a Catalan automorphism: swap the two leftmost subtrees of general trees, if the root degree (A057515(n)) is even.
comment: This is a self-inverse automorfism (an involution). Can be used to construct A130373.
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2055
Index entries for signature-permutations of Catalan automorphisms
program: (Destructive Scheme implementation of this automorphism, which acts on S-expressions, i.e. list-structures:)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 05 2007
